abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Financial Sector Capacity Building Project will build the
            foundation for a more transparent, well-governed,
            well-regulated, and competitive financial sector that
            allocates resources to the private sector more effectively
            and efficiently, and helps ensure better access to finance
            for all. The extension is necessary to allow for the
            successful installation and completion of the credit
            information bureau. Reviewed the action plan and to extend
            the project closing date by four months instead of the
            requested three months, from May 31, 2011 to September 30,
            2011. This will enable the project to fully disburse the
            allocated funding for the project and allow the project the
            come closer to achieving its development objectives. This
            will be the third and last extension of the project. The
            original closing date was June 30, 2009 which was extended
            two times to the current date of May 31, 2011. The closing
            date for project will be extended from May, 31, 2011 to
            September 30, 2011.
